meanings.sent1: The stainproof fabric repelled all spills effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Her stainproof shirt remained spotless even after a messy meal.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was made of stainproof material to avoid any accidental spills during battles.
meanings.sent4: The stainproof shield protected the knight from any marks or blemishes.
meanings.sent5: The stainproof coating on the table made cleanup a breeze.

meanings.sent1: The stainproof carpet resisted any dirt or spills.
meanings.sent2: The stainproof walls in the kitchen were a lifesaver for busy cooks.
meanings.sent3: The stainproof reputation of the magic potion made it highly sought after by clumsy wizards.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and stainproof as her teeth after using the new toothpaste.
meanings.sent5: The stainproof reputation of the superhero's costume made it the envy of all other heroes.
